# HABS-HD <a href="https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research/"><img src="man/figures/logo.png" align="right" height="138" /></a>

## Overview

`HABSHD` is an R package containing data and code to reproduce results from the **The Health & Aging Brain Study: Health Disparities (HABS-HD)** study [@OBryant2021health]. `HABSHD` is a bundle of data, analysis code examples, and html and pdf documentation. Documentation can be found at [https://atri-biostats.github.io/HABSHD](https://atri-biostats.github.io/HABSHD)

All data, including the `HABSHD` R package, is avalialable from [https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research/](https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research/) after registering and agreeing to the [data use agreement](https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/assets/documents/HABS_HD%20DUA.final.pdf).

## Installation

To install `HABSHD`:

* Register at [https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research](https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research)
* Download ``r pkgFilename`` from [https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research/](https://apps.unthsc.edu/itr/research/)
* In R, run ``r paste0("install.packages(\"path/to/", pkgFilename, "\", repos = NULL, type = \"source\")")``

The script to build this R package can be found in [tools](https://github.com/mcdonohue/HABSHD/tree/main/tools).
